version_description: Fixed bugs

New animated and static templates added.
Undo/rendo functionality.
New text editing option — kerning.
Improved app performance and fixed bugs.
Bug fix.

Animated stickers added

Added animated templates in every category
Added new text styles
Improved discover screen
Various bug fixes and stability improvements under the hood
Performance upgrades.

Finally, you can save your project in Lift app and reuse it for further Stories.
Also added new text animations and optimized editing flow.
Fixed a bunch of bugs to improve our app.

Duration. A new feature that allows you to fully customize the animation of your story template.

Now you can add your favourite music to Stories, get popular songs from chart.
Moreover, you can generate unique license-free music tracks powered by AI.
Stay tuned for next releases, we've prepared more features for music.
Fixed critical issue with the black square on export.
Optimized for iPhone 12 and 12 Pro.

Now all templates is fully customisable. You can edit or delete any elements you don't need.
Add downloaded music from your Files or iTunes or even record your voice with Recorder.
Customise sticker colours.
Fixed bugs.

Lift account. Sign in and save your stories and get access to them after reinstalling the app and from multiple devices.

Slideshow. New feature allows you to show up to 5 images or videos in one template. Great for presenting your business work samples, lookbooks, clothes collections, and more.

Added a new type of templates — Collages! Choose from 100+ new templates to create awesome stories.
Improved story-making behavior. Just tap a Plus button on the main screen and enjoy easy to use flow :)
